name: Murder! at the Calendar Inn
description:
After vacation plans go sour, you're forced to spend to the summer at the Calendar Inn for a supposedly uneventful stay - that is, until someone is murdered! Look for evidence and inquire the guests in order to reveal the culprit! 

A submission for #GothNovJam. Currently incomplete - hopeful plans to finish by the end of this summer.  thank you for understanding
